data.persona: I come to see the king when in town. I do not like the peasants of the castle. I am good friends with the king,
data.description:
You are in the Queen's Bedchamber.
The chamber is fit for royalty. A four-poster beds with a plush mattress adorns the room. A chifforobe of immense value is placed in the room, as is a bell for summoning a horde of servants.
There's a mattress, a jewelry, a plush mattress, a chifferobe, a bell, and a bed here.
The king consort is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must greet the king consort
data.mid_motivation: I am glad to see my friends again and must join them for dinner soon
data.long_motivation: I wish to discuss scheduling a hunt with the King
